Package org.ingatan.component.image

Classes to do with Ingatan's inbuilt image editor, including the image editor itself as ImageEditorPane.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EditorCanvas This extension of JPanel performs the following: Allows the user to write to an encapsualted BufferedImage using various tools Renders the BufferedImage to itself. Keeps an undo-redo record in the form of previous buffered images. Keeps track of the current selection (if any) that is made.
ImageAcquisitionDialog Extension of the JFrame that ties together all image acquisition methods into a menu.
ImageCollectionBrowser This is essentially a clip-art library, with the user able to choose from different categories.
ImageEditorPane A simple image editor, including toolbar, colour chooser, tool options and a scrollable canvas.
ImageToolbar Provides a toolbar for the image editor.
JMathTeXCreationPane This pane is presented as a tool as part of the ImageAcquisitionDialog/.
LibraryResourceBrowser Displays all image files contained by the selected library.
Thumbnail Displays an ImageIcon in the style of a thumbnail.
ThumbnailPane Displays a panel of thumbnails.
 

Package org.ingatan.component.image Description

Classes to do with Ingatan's inbuilt image editor, including the image editor itself as ImageEditorPane. Most of these are subcomponents bar the ImageAcquisitionDialog.
